comment: The Chinese Remainder Theorem: the function that maps ` x ` to its remainder classes ` mod M ` and ` mod N ` is 1-1 and onto when ` M ` and ` N ` are coprime. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
